column2: THE COUNTRY CONDUCTED AT LEAST ONE NATIONAL MASS MEDIA CAMPAIGN*
column3: CAMPAIGN WAS PART OF A COMPREHENSIVE TOBACCO CONTROL PROGRAMME
column4: CAMPAIGN WAS PRE-TESTED  WITH THE TARGET AUDIENCE
column5: RESEARCH ABOUT THE TARGET AUDIENCE WAS CONDUCTED
column6: CAMPAIGN WAS AIRED ON TELEVISION AND/OR RADIO
column8: EARNED MEDIA/PUBLIC RELATIONS WERE USED TO PROMOTE THE CAMPAIGN
column9: PROCESS EVALUATION WAS EMPLOYED TO ASSESS IMPLEMENTATION
column10: OUTCOME EVALUATION WAS EMPLOYED TO ASSESS  EFFECTIVENESS

column1: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
